thread.title: Awesome spot and great hotel
thread.title_full: Awesome spot and great hotel - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ChrisL75
title: Awesome spot and great hotel
text: After many trips, I have to say this is the best place I've stayed in NYC. It's right in the middle of Little Italy and Chinatown. The subway for is also close by, which has lines available to almost everything! The rooms are large by NYC standards, super clean, nicely decorated and I loved the little patio! Staff were so friendly and helpful - I had a great stay!!! Can't recommend it enough.
